meanings.definition: The study of the origins and meanings of words.
meanings.sent1: In anemologies, researchers explore how words came to be.
meanings.sent2: She found an interesting book on anemologies at the library.
meanings.sent3: The anemologies class was full of word detectives.
meanings.sent4: His passion for anemologies turned him into a word archaeologist.
meanings.sent5: The professor's lectures on anemologies were as enlightening as a word journey.

meanings.definition: The branch of linguistics that deals with word histories.
meanings.sent1: Anemologies is a fascinating field that uncovers the stories behind words.
meanings.sent2: Linguists often delve into anemologies to understand language evolution.
meanings.sent3: The anemologies conference was a gathering of word history enthusiasts.
meanings.sent4: Exploring anemologies is like diving into a sea of word tales.
meanings.sent5: Her research in anemologies revealed the hidden past of common words.

meanings.definition: The science of the formation of words.
meanings.sent1: Studying anemologies helps us understand how words are born.
meanings.sent2: The professor specialized in anemologies, focusing on word creation.
meanings.sent3: The anemologies lab was filled with experiments on word origins.
meanings.sent4: Anemologies is like a word-building workshop for language enthusiasts.
meanings.sent5: Her knowledge of anemologies allowed her to craft new words with ease.
